briefTitle: Early Detection of Breast Cancer and Cervical Cancer in Women in India
officialTitle: Early Detection of Common Cancers in Women in India
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Effectiveness of well planned health education programs and low-cost screening methods (e.g., clinical breast exam and visual inspection of the cervix) in reducing the incidence of and mortality due to breast and cervical cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS:

* Resides in 1 of 20 geographically defined clusters within the slums of Mumbai, India

PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS:

* Not specified

PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY:

* Not specified
